alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:42PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yakima County through 415 PM PDT... At 340 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Rimrock, or 21 miles west of Yakima, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Yakima County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
